name: Infinite Job Transfer: I Can Summon Max Level Goddess
author: Renshan Animation
content: Yun Xinghe, who encountered a bizarre car accident, opened his eyes and found himself in a dangerous world. What&#039s worse, a beautiful fairy did a series of shameful things to him and said she would be responsible for him. Hey... what are you talking about! ? I&#039m a gentleman... Wait, what&#039s the point of unlimited job transfer? Where&#039s the beauty around me? ! ! !
